app.title: wordwank
app.waiting_next_game: Waiting for next game to start...
app.rules_summary: Wordwank is a high-speed vocabulary duel! Use your 7 tiles to form the highest scoring word before time runs out. Consonants have random values (2-9), while vowels are always 1 point. One letter each day is worth a lucky 7 points. Discover the two rare 'Unicorn' letters worth 10 points! If you use all 7 tiles, you get a +10 bonus. Careful: if you duplicate someone else's word, you get 0 points, but the first person to play it gets a +1 bonus for your laziness!
app.error_word_not_found: The word '{{word}}' is not in our dictionary of wank.

results.title: GAME OVER
results.riveting: Everyone just stared at the screen. Riveting.
results.next_game_soon: Click anywhere or press any key to play again...

auth.welcome_back: Welcome back, explorer! Ready to continue?
auth.privacy_hint: We only use your email for account recovery and to sync your sanity across devices.
